reviewText: When I saw the title I thought this would be a single episode release but this left something to be desired.  The special features weren't that special and only three out of four episodes played.  the Power rangers Zeo episode wouldn't even play.  I liked the way they tied the two plotlines with Christmas at the Shiba house and the Bulk and uh Spike's nephew.  I would rather have seen the special release "Alpha's white Christmas in the  mix instead of the "special features".
Title: N/A

reviewText: Pass on this, I feel the "Product Details" is a little misleading, they should say up front this is three separate episodes, and not pass this off as a movie.Also, all the episodes on this DVD, can be found for FREE, on Netflix.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is an excellent addition to the collection of episodes for the Samurai series.  In this episode Emily is writing her sister about the past year. She recalls different things that have happened to the rangers since becoming rangers and especially how they became rangers.  Each ranger looks forward to Christmas and Mike gets a surprise when he thinks everyone forgot him.  Also Bulk and Spike recall their past year learning to become samurai and they receive a gift from the green ranger who learned the true meaning of Christmas.  Also this product contains two Christmas episodes from Mighty Morphin Power Rangers "I'm Dreaming of a White Ranger" and Power Rangers Zeo "A Season to Remember."  This is for anyone who likes Power Rangers, collects the Power Rangers seasons and especially Samurai.
Title: N/A

reviewText: My son loved this dvd.  Thought the combination of power rangers and christmas was fantactic.  A modern version of saving santa.
